channel.title: INtech
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from INtech, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: The RealReal founder Julie Wainwright has a startling new memoir
item.description: Julie Wainwright has taken two companies public, an incredible feat by any standard. Yet in her new memoir, Time to Get Real, she offers readers somet...

item.title: Amazon’s big book sale just happens to overlap with Independent Bookstore Day
item.description: Amazon is raising eyebrows with the timing of its big book sale for 2025, which runs from April 23 to 28 — which means it’s competing directly with In...

item.title: The 11 Best Scented Candles (2025)
item.description: Set the right mood with these tried-and-tested candles.

item.title: Google will stop supporting early Nest thermostats on October 25
item.description: Google announced this week that beginning on October 25, it will no longer support or release software updates for the first and second generation Nes...

item.title: Week in Review: Cluely helps you cheat on everything
item.description: Welcome back to Week in Review! We’ve got tons of news for you this week: Slate EVs spotted in the wild; Airbnb pricing updates; a hack at Blue Shield...

item.title: Google’s DeepMind UK team reportedly seeks to unionize
item.description: Around 300 London-based members of Google’s AI-focused DeepMind team are seeking to unionize with the Communication Workers Union, according to a Fina...

item.title: 11 Best MagSafe Wallets (2025), Tested and Reviewed
item.description: These convenient and slim magnetic wallets stick to the back of your smartphone.

item.title: Fujifilm Instax Mini 41 Review: A Stylish, Capable Budget Instant Camera
item.description: Fujifilm’s latest Instax camera is simple, delightful, and capable of some surprisingly good images.

item.title: 20 Mother's Day Gift Ideas Our Editors Have Tried and Love (2025)
item.description: From photo books and iPads to board games and bike bags, we have a pick for every type of mom and mom figure.

item.title: BoldHue Review: Print Your Own Foundation
item.description: This makeup printer custom shade-matches you—and creates your foundation on demand.
